title: Revelation Online actually looks fantastic

embed.description: Is Swordmage the class for you? Cover Art was done by Renpai http://www.twitter.com/NoticeMeRenpai Laufie's Blog (Swordmage Page): http://laufie-ro.tumblr.com/post/146917360668/revelation-swordmage-skillstooltips ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Website ► http://loadingcryy.com Donate ►https://www.twitchalerts.com/donate/cryyfuu Twitch ►https://www.twitch.tv/cryyfuu Twitter ►http://www.twitter.com/loadingcryy Facebook ►https://www.facebook.com/cryyfuu MMOsite ► http://goo.gl/mZXwtl My Artist Nat ►https://twitter.com/celebaire My Artist Renpai ►https://twitter.com/NoticeMeRenpai My Writer Sayomi ►https://twitter.com/sayomistorm **Sponsored** Try Loot Anime & $upport Cryy ► http://www.lootcrate.com/cryy Use code 'cryy' for 10% off any crate at checkout!

body:
The environment looks great, and the combat looks fun as fuck.

It's like everything Tera and Blade and Soul tried to be but failed at.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?&v=BgTnPxSQbYc

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TEF6Vk0HAkA
